entry.title: Ema Zajmović (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that poker player Ema Zajmović (pictured) received a wrestling-style belt when she won a World Poker Tour event in Montreal?

entry.title: City Nights (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that the San Francisco nightclub City Nights was the target of bombing threats by an alleged supporter of the Islamic State?

entry.title: Cathy Nutbrown (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that a report led by academic Cathy Nutbrown concluded that qualifications for vocational courses in childcare and early education were laxer than in animal welfare?

entry.title: Kandake of the Sudanese Revolution (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that the photograph Kandake of the Sudanese Revolution symbolised the determination of the Sudanese people as they called for political change?

entry.title: Sarita Colonia (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that some prisoners in Peru get tattoos of Sarita Colonia for alleged protection?

entry.title: Labour (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that the song "Labour" started a TikTok trend of women sharing their experiences with sexism?

entry.title: Texas's congressional and legislative districts (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that the United States Supreme Court has struck down Texas's congressional and legislative districts numerous times?

entry.title: Tavius Robinson (Wikipedia — did you know?)
entry.content: ... that it was through a social media post that 2023 NFL Draft pick Tavius Robinson was able to receive several offers to play college football?
